text: Housefull is an Indian comedy movie series. The serie is made by Sajid Nadiadwala. It is distributed by Eros International, Fox Star Studios and Yash Raj Films. THe series is based on a theme of confusion-and-correction. Housefull, the first movie of the series, is the most expensive Indian comedy movie ever made. Each movie begins with a new story. Their stories are not related to the story of the movies that were before it. The theme and the pace of each movie is the same. ==Overview== ===Housefull (2010)=== Aarush (Akshay Kumar) is unlucky man. He carries his bad luck wherever he goes. His tries to find love but makes his life more bad as he ends up in complicated situations. ===Housefull 2 (2012)=== This movie is an adaptation of the Marathi movie Dam Dam Diga Diga, (2008) and Telugu movie Hungama (2005). Hungama is a remake of Malayalam movie Mattupetti Machan (1998). The movie is about four men who date and marry the women of their dreams by changing their identities and deceiving their prospective fathers-in-law. ===Housefull 3 (2016)=== A rich businessman does not want his three daughters to get married because of a superstitious belief. Now, their boyfriends must prove to him that they are perfect for his daughters. ===Housefull 4 (2019)=== Three brothers are set to marry three sisters. However, a peek into the distant past reveals to one of the brothers that their brides have been mixed up in their current reincarnation. == Movies == Movie Release date Director Screenwriter(s) Story by Producer Housefull 30 April 2010 Sajid Khan Milap Zaveri, Sajid Khan, Vibha Singh Sajid Nadiadwala Sajid Nadiadwala Housefull 2 5 April 2012 Sajid Khan Sajid Khan, Farhad-Sajid Sajid Nadiadwala Sajid Nadiadwala Housefull 3 3 June 2016 Sajid-Farhad Sajid- Farhad, Rajan Agarwal K. Subash Sajid Nadiadwala Housefull 4 25 October 2019 Farhad Samji Farhad Samji, Tushar Hiranandani, Sparsh Khetarpal, Tasha Bhambra Sara Bodinar, Sajid Nadiadwala Sajid Nadiadwala ==Future movies== Movie Release date Director Screenwriter(s) Story by Producer(s) Status Housefull 5 2025 Sajid Khan Sajid Nadiadwala Sajid Nadiadwala In-Devlopment ===Housefull 5=== After the success of the fourth movie, the makers said that they will return for a fifth movie in the series, but "say, after five years". Housefull 5 will mark the return of Deepika Padukone, Kriti Sanon, John Abraham, Abhishek Bachchan, Jacqueline Fernandez, Pooja Hegde, Akshay Kumar and others from the other four movies in the series. == Recurring cast and characters == This table lists the main characters who appear in the Houseful franchchise Characters Movies Housefull Housefull 2 Housefull 3 Housefull 4 Housefull 5 Akshay Kumar Aarush Awasthi Sunil Pujari "Sunny" Sandy/Sundy Sehgal Harry / Rajkumar Bala Dev Singh Prem Malhotra Riteish Deshmukh Baburao "Bob" Jolly / Jwala Teddy Roy / Bangdu Maharaj Bobby Oberoi Deepika Padukone Soundarya "Sandy" Bhagyalaxmi Venkateswari Basappa Rao Boman Irani Batuk Patel Anna Seth Chunky Pandey Aakhri Pasta Aakhri Pasta Aakhri Pasta Aakhri Pasta / Pehla Pasta Sasta Pasta Jacqueline Fernandez Dhanno Bobby Kapoor Ganga "Gracy" Patel Jenny John Abraham Max Mehrotkar Raja Chauhan Malaika Arora Pooja Anarkali Vindu Dara Singh Security Guard Sosa TBA Manoj Pahwa Banta Singh Big Bhai TBA Kriti Sanon Kriti / Rajkumari Madhu Kriti Verma Pooja Hegde Pooja / Rajkumari Mala Pooja Sharma Ranjeet Ranjeet K.
